game.name: Kitsune Zenko Adventure
game.description:
People call fox as the Zenko in Japan. The specialty of these foxes is that they all are known for their kind and caring nature. You are going to meet with a cute and little fox that has lost his way to the hometown. But luckily he has spotted you who are also very kind-hearted towards the animals. So, why you need to waste your time anymore? Join Kitsune Zenko Adventure game and help the little animal to find his hometown!
You are going to have the same fun in this pixel adventure platform as you experienced in the classic platform game Mario. It is going to be so amazing to be a part of the lovely adventure of this nice fox! Not everything is going to be easy at all since many dangerous obstacles and monsters are waiting for you. Do not forget to grab all the cherries and diamonds in each level. Try to avoid all kinds of obstacles and air crashes to survive until you accomplish the mission!
Avoid and jump over your enemies if possible to kill them in this html5 platform game! Make sure to grab as many diamonds as you can to finish each level. This jumper platformer challenge includes 10 highly addictive and challenging levels, 2 camera mode, auto save level progress, retro-style platform gameplay, huge and adventures map, as well as plenty of enemies to kill. You can enjoy this best platformer game online or offline in your device. Checks out more avoid games for boys that are free to play online no download!
